title: Enterprise Sobha Portal Scraper Input
description: Configuration for the enterprise-grade Sobha Partner Portal scraper built for BARACA Life Capital Real Estate.

email.title: Sobha Portal Email Address
email.description: Your verified Sobha Partner Portal email address for authentication.

password.title: Sobha Portal Password
password.description: Your secure Sobha Partner Portal password. This field is encrypted and secure.

scrapeMode.title: Scraping Mode
scrapeMode.description: Choose your scraping strategy: 'bulk' for multiple properties or 'specific' for targeted unit lookup.

filters.title: Advanced Property Filters
filters.description: Apply intelligent filters for bulk scraping. Example: {'bedrooms': '1 Bed Type C', 'project': 'Sobha SeaHaven', 'price': '1M-2M'}

specificUnit.title: Specific Unit Details
specificUnit.description: For specific unit targeting (use with 'specific' scrape mode). Example: {'unitNo': 'SSH-A4105', 'project': 'Sobha SeaHaven'}

maxResults.title: Maximum Results Limit
maxResults.description: Maximum number of properties to extract. Enterprise limit: 10,000 for performance optimization.

parallelRequests.title: Concurrent Processing Threads
parallelRequests.description: Number of parallel browser instances for faster processing.

requestDelay.title: Request Delay (seconds)
requestDelay.description: Base delay between requests in seconds to respect server resources and avoid blocking.

retryAttempts.title: Error Recovery Attempts
retryAttempts.description: Number of automatic retry attempts for failed requests.

enableStealth.title: Advanced Stealth Mode
enableStealth.description: Enable enterprise-grade anti-detection measures including browser fingerprint masking.

downloadDocuments.title: Document Extraction
downloadDocuments.description: Download PDF quotations and floorplans for comprehensive property analysis.
